text: Scott Oxley (born 22 November 1976) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Stocksbridge Park Steels. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:York City F.C. players Category:Stocksbridge Park Steels F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Scott Oxley
